div.div: Pike County School Corporation's Vision is to build a legacy of academic excellence for all students.
The Mission of the Pike County School Corporation is to provide all students with a quality education that encourages them to become successful citizens.

p.style: margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 15px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; text-align: center;
margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 15px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;
margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 15px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;

strong.strong: 1. Ambitious: Our administration, teachers, and staff are hard working individuals focused on providing a quality education for all of our students.

p.style: margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 15px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;

strong.strong: 2. Tenacious: Our administration, teachers, and staff are dedicated, dependable individuals who persevere until all students achieve their academic goals.

p.style: margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 15px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;

strong.strong: 3. Passionate: Our administration, teachers, and staff are compassionate and enthusiastic and have an intense desire to guide all students in their quest for knowledge.

p.style: margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 15px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;

strong.strong: 4. Integrity: Our administration, teachers, and staff are positive individuals who possess and steadfastly adhere to high moral principles and professional standards while respecting their students and each other.

p.style: margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 15px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;

strong.strong: 5. Innovative: Our administration, teachers, and staff are creative and resourceful
